summary: The diff implements most of the BuildRequest requirements including store initialization guards, homepage-as-default entry point, login button binding, localStorage persistence, authentication-gated dashboard rendering, and re-injection of Asset Shield and Live Spectral Analysis components. However, REQ-8 regarding dark theme preservation appears violated, as AssetShieldCard uses white/light styling instead of the requested dark glassmorphic theme.

hallucinated_features.description: AssetShieldCard uses light theme styling with white background instead of dark glassmorphic theme
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 explicitly requires maintaining 'high-end dark theme with glassmorphic UI styling' and preserving 'scanlines, gradients, and tactical aesthetics'. AssetShieldCard.tsx shows 'bg-white border-[#10b981]/20' and 'text-gray-900' instead of dark theme colors. The card also lacks backdrop blur, glassmorphic transparency, and tactical aesthetics requested.

hallucinated_features.description: CommandCenter page uses light theme gradient instead of dark theme
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 requires dark theme preservation. CommandCenter.tsx shows 'bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-50 via-blue-50/30 to-slate-100' which is a light slate/blue gradient, not the dark theme specified in the BuildRequest.
